msg: add transactional support to SSO addCredentials

author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-3808 fix npe on shutdown.  Not convinced this is compatible with resource bindings

author: jdcasey
msg: Add warnings for deprecation of aggregator-mojos bound to the lifecycle, and add error/error-logging (error when directly in the pom, error-logging when brought in via lifecycle mapping, etc.) when a direct-invocation mojo (@requiresDirectInvocation) is bound to the lifecycle.
